132.content: who should we spank first
132.title: Danny Phantom

choices: Kim spanks Ron here and now
Kim cools off and spanks him the next day
133.content:
It was Wade with an urgent message. "Kim, it's Drakken again. He's broken into the Middleton library. I don't know what he's up to but if you get there quickly you can catch him in the act. Of whatever it is."

"Really Wade? Okay. I'll call Ron."

"I'm already on it Kim. He said he'd be there in 5."

10 minutes later, no Ron. Kim was getting anxious. "We're going to miss Drakken" she though, looking at her watch. Where the hell is Ron?

Another 15 minutes goes by. Finally, Ron comes in, licking nacho cheese off his lips. "What's the sitch Kim?"

"Ron! When Wade called you, didn't he say we'd be catching Drakken in the act?"

"Well, yeah", said Ron, picking a bit of green onion out of teeth. "He usually takes 22 minutes to do stuff though."

"Ron, leaving me waiting here was bratty and immature. Why, I ought to..."
133.title: Kim Possible

1331.content:
Kim grabs Ron and places her over her knee.
She starts spanking his rear end through his pants.
Ron tries to stop Kim but she is too strong for him.
Ron is not screaming from the pain, does Kim decide to pull down his pants for a bare bottom spanking?
1331.title: Kim spanks Ron here and now

choices: Start with a bare bottom warmup first
13311.content:
With all of his kicking and squirming, Kim had already had to take Ron's wrist and pin it in the small of his back. "Ron, you're such a baby!" Kim said firmly. "You cost us the chance to get Drakken!"

"I-I-m s-s-sorry Kim" said Ron weakly. "They were having a sale at BN and..."

"I don't care Ron. You're inconsiderate and you sometimes act like a little boy. You're lucky you didn't piss off my Mom like this. She'd be laying her hairbrush on your bare behind. Lucky for you, I didn't bring my hairbrush with me!"

Wade had been listening on the Kimmunicator to this whole transaction. He secretly wished he had been the one over Kim's knee, but that's a story for another time. Unbeknownst to Kim, Wade had installed a 3D replicator in the pocket of Kim's cargo pants. All she had to do was to think of an object and it would be replicated as if by magic.

As she said "hairbrush", she heard a whirring by her leg and felt something in pocket. She looked at Ron, then reached into her pocket. It was a hairbrush, every bit as large and foreboding as the one she pictured spanking Ron with. 'Wade?', she thought, 'are you responsible for this?'

"You may need to thank Wade for the hairbrush, naughty boy" said Kim as she slipped Ron's pants off of him and let them drop to his knees. "These too, I think" she said, slapping him on the bottom and telling him to lift up his hips. He did so, and she slipped his underpants down to form a puddle of underwear next to his pants.
13311.title: Kim is not happy

choices: Ron talks her out of using the brush

"Kim! No! You can't!" yelled Ron

"Yes Ron, I can and keep your voice down unless you want everyone to hear."

Ron was puzzled by that. A bare bottom spanking isn't exactly quiet but he knew better than to talk back to Kim. "Yes Kim." he said, and lowered his head.

Kim began slowly and started spanking Ron's bare behind with her hand. She knew exactly how to cup her hand and use her wrist to get the maximum effect on Ron's bottom without making a lot of unneccesary noise. After a few minutes of spanking, Ron was whimpering quietly and his bottom was a rosy pink.

She then showed Ron the hairbrush. "So Ron, can you tell me why; give me any reason why I shouldn't roast your bottom with this brush?"

choices: A reminder spanking before letting him up
Enough for now, but Kim spies a drone (bright green) hovering overhead
13311122.content:
Kim put down the hairbrush and gently placed her hand on Ron's now-flaming bottom. "See Ron? There are consequences for your actions. It's hard enough to save the world before bedtime without your shenanigans."

Ron sobbed softly over Kim's lap. He knew she was right. "I'm so sorry K-k-kim." he blubbered. "The nachos could have waited."

"I see, Ron." Kim was always amazed at how shortsighted Ron could be. "Did you realize that this could have been the night that Drakken took over the world? Is that what you want?" She waited for a few seconds. No response from Ron. Raising her hand, she cupped it slightly and brought it down on Ron's left cheek. It bounced and jiggled and Ron yelped.

"N-no! Kim! I don't want that! No one does!"

"You're right about that naughty boy. Will I have to remind you in the future to put the world ahead of your stomach?"
13311122.title: Lecture on responsibility

choices: A hit from Drakken on the website
133111222.content:
Before Ron could answer, Kim pushed him onto the floor. He tried to stand but his pants were puddled around his ankles. Kim jumped to her feet and pulled out her hairdryer grappling hook. Aiming at the drone she fired. The hook glanced off the drone as it quickly turned and sped away.

"That really grinds my beans!" Kim said, then shook her head. "Wow, when did I start talking like my dad? Ron, did you see that? I think Shego was watching us from a drone."

"What are you worried about Kim? You weren't the one with the bright red bum." Ron had his underwear back on now and rubbed his bottom thoughtfully. Looking around for the drone he quickly pulled up his pants.

"Why do you think she was watching? That's low, even for Shego."

"Yes", replied Ron. "It is, but never misunderestimate your enemies."

Kim smiled. "Yep, gotcha George." She reeled the grappling hook back into the hairdryer and stuck it back in the holster.
133111222.title: Enough for now, but Kim spies a drone (bright g...

1331112222.content:
The Kimmunicator buzzed to life. Wade was laughing as he addressed Kim. "K-k-im", he sputtered, we just got a posting on the website. Drakken had Shego tailing you by drone. I think 'tail' is the operative word, right Ron? HA Anyway, Shego posted the video of you, well, of your team meeting." Wade disappeared tom view as he started rolling on the floor, laughing.

"That was private business Wade", said Kim. "Ron and I needed to discuss his behavior. I'm a little concerned about yours now." She tapped her foot as she spoke and lowered her tone.

Wade sat back up and put on a serious face. "Um Kim, there was another hit as well. It's not quite saving the world though."
1331112222.title: A hit from Drakken on the website

choices: Rush to the store to look for clues
13311122222.content:
"When did the website hit come in?" she asked, a little out of breath herself from the exertion.

"A few minutes ago." responded Wade.

"And why didn't you tell me about it right away?"

"I was, um, busy."

"Watching the video? How many times did you watch it?"

"Just once", he lied.

"That couldn't have taken too long. What was the website hit?" she asked.

"A robot parts store was robbed. I think it was Drakken, looking for parts to make another round of Bebes"

"Oh, really?" she wondered. As she thought about what to do next, she watched Ron rub his freshly spanked bottom. It clearly made an impression on him and she hoped he had learned from it.
13311122222.title: Talk about the website hit

choices: Kim's mom, Dr. Ann Possible demonstrates proper spanking technique on Ron
1332.content:
"What Kim?" asked Ron. "I'm really sorry if I let you down. We'll have another chance to get Drakken."

"Yeah sure Ron. I'm sure we will. Now get out of here before I do or say something I'll regret later."

Ron knew Kim well and knew she was upset. He apologized again and headed home. Kim started home too but couldn't stop thinking about Ron's childish attitude. "What was he thinking?" she wondered. "Doesn't he realize that we could have captured him this time?" As she walked, she got calmer but still thought about how she could convince Ron to take the crime fighting more seriously.

135312111.content:
The Joker liked to give his favourite Henchgirl a treat every now and again. Harley pounced onto his desk, demanding attention like a jealous cat. Sizing up her intentions, he decided he could afford the fun.

http://www.geekxgirls.com/images/latexjo...

"Hiya, Mista, J." she posed for his pleasure. "There's that boring paperwork... or there's me...."

So with the boys out checking out a new target, he and Harley got down to having some fun. Soon, Harley was over his lap, her latex catsuit, squeaking as her legs thrashed in the air, as he landed blow after blow on her defenceless cheeks. Her giggling shrieks of pleasure, letting him know how much she was loving it.

He allowed her to escape, and reverse the situation. She had him bent over the desk. She didn't start straight away, and the Joker looked over his shoulder to check. Harley was drawing out a generous paddle. Playfully she slapped it against her own hand, shaking it, as the pins and needles shot along her veins.

Flexing her fingers, she placed them on the base of the Joker's spine.

"Let the fun begin." she chortled.

The blows fell, the paddle being big enough to hit the whole of the joker's arse. It made a resounding -thwack-, with each blow. But the pain wasn't too bad, just showy and loud. In fact, he loved the warmth spreading throughout his body.

The joker got into it, flinching dramatically with each impact. His hair thrashed about, as he put on the role of victim. Not a role he played for many.

Harley's giggles became louder, and wilder, as the punishment continued.

It unsettled the joker. Looking again, he saw with horror that his good suit, was now taking on the shine of latex. As each blow fell, the material changed more and more. He tried to slip free, and found Harley was stronger than she should have been... Or rather he was weaker. Bracing both hands on the desk he levered himself up. Or rather she levered herself up.

Harley backed away with a wide, wide smile on her face. The joker staggered as she found her heels unfamiliar. The latex clung tightly telling her in no uncertain terms that she was fully a woman.

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736...

"Harley, honey..."

She stopped, even her voice lacked it's usual menace. She sounded like just another bimbo. She sounded exactly like Harley. An unwanted shiver raced down her spine. Was she weak like Harley... or worse... was she weaker than Harley?

13531212221223.content:
Holding Harley down with her elbow, Barbara reached around to a rarely used compartment of her utility belt. Batman had given her something that he said he would probably need to use on her one day. Curious, Barbara had checked it out and was rather horrified to find that it was a nuclear-powered hairbrush. The concept was brilliant - a hairbrush that used a small nuclear reactor (completely safe, of course) to amplify whatever force was applied to a naughty bottom. The horror was that Batman wanted her to carry it in case she had to go over his lap some day. "Batman is one arrogant pig" she thought when she figured it out. "It would serve him right if I pulled up his cape and spanked him with it."

Nevertheless, she didn't want to anger Batman, so she carried it. And now, Harley needed some serious spanking and she had this device... She pulled it out and switched it on. It made a low but substantial and rather terrifying hum. Harley froze. "H-hey, what is that?" She asked. "What do you think you're doing?"

Barbara brought the device down hard on Harley's bottom. As the super Batbrush made contact, she could feel the handle pulse as her energy was amplified, passed right through Harley's outfit and underwear and directly to the bare flesh. Harley yelped. It was as if Mr Freeze's ice/heat ray was switched to high and pointed directly at her bottom. Her legs fluttered wildly and her free hand flew back to try and stop the assault.

"Oh, not so fast Missy", said Barbara. "I seem to have your attention now. Do you like this new toy? Consider it a spanking from Batman as well - he gave me this. As I understand it, it delivers amplified spanks directly to your bare skin by bypassing your clothes. Batman is a genius, don't you agree?" With that Barbara raised the Batbrush again and brought it down on the other cheek. Again, Harley screamed and yelped.

Coughing and sputtering, Harley said "a perverted one, perhaps. Why in blazes would he come up with such a thing? Maybe to use it on you?" Her outburst was rewarded with a quick volley of Batspanks, several on each cheek. Again, Harley coughed and sputtered trying to catch her breath.

Out of the shadows, a figure in purple and green formalwear loomed. Barbara looked up and the Joker, the clown prince of crime, strolled into the room. Harley strained her head and turned to see him. As she did so, Barbara realized that to Harley, this whole spanking was just a turnon. She pushed Harley onto the floor and turned to face Joker.

"Joker!" she exclaimed, unwittingly pointing at him with the atomic hairbrush. "You have no business coming in here. This is the ladies' locker room!"

Snatching the brush from her, Joker replied "and you're no lady, my dear." He examined the brush. "My, this is a fascinating piece of engineering." he noted. Slapping against his hand, it whirred into life again. "Holy bristles, Batman!" he said, mocking Robin (who would have said something equally silly had he been there). "Tell me dear girl, what does this do?" he asked.

Harley, now standing, rubbed her bottom thoughtfully. "It's amazing, Mistah J. It kind of, well, has a special bite to it."

Feeling it buzzing in his hands, Joker turned to Barbara. "Tsk, tsk. Someone has been a very bat girl. Tell me, what does this do?"

Harley snickered at Joker's lame pun and looked at Barbara.

13531222.title: Scarecrow?

135312221.content: Now why is Scarecrow being spanked?
135312221.title: Spanked Scarecrow

1353122211.content:
Jonathan Crane AKA The Scarecrow was currently in Arkham, he was trying to think of an escape plan when suddenly someone told him

"Um...Professor Crane. It's time for your therapy session."

Jonathan muttered under his breath as usual about the idiocy of the Master of Fear needing therapy, none the less he went to his therapist's room because he didn't have much of a choice.

When he got there his Therapist Joanne Barker was not at her usual desk, instead she was at the loveseat to left side of the room, she was quietly reading a book, but that wasn't what made Jonathan turn pale

He saw that she had three rather nasty looking items with her

A small but thick paddle with holes in it, a leather strap, and a large wooden paddle with sharp edges and nickel sized holes in it!

Jonathan feared pain, years of being bullied as a child made him terrified of being hurt,he tried to slowly back away.

Just then Joanne put her book down, she smiled ever so graciously

"Welcome Professor Crane." She said sweetly "I see your right on time for your appointment."

Jonathan at this point was sweating buckets, he was pretty sure he just heard the door lock behind him.
